lead_paragraph: Trees on the high Arctic fells here are so coated in frosty rime that they look like towers of shaving foam, or maybe a giant column of popcorn.
snippet: Trees on the high Arctic fells here are so coated in frosty rime that they look like towers of shaving foam, or maybe a giant column of popcorn....

headline.main: In Lapland, Nature’s Outdoor Sculpture Park
